message.content:
Perfect! Now I can see that the route is defined using `Route::resource('posts', PostController::class);` in the admin routes. This means the PUT route `/admin/posts/{post}` is part of the resource route, and the `{post}` parameter is the route parameter that gets injected into the controller method.
